description: Workplace, orchestration, tools, and operational workflow for AI-assisted development and research.

auth: password-protected GUI for Vibe Diffuse Kanban
servers.notes: Main remote machine. Hosts Vibe Diffuse Kanban; used predominantly over CLI. Codex and Cline authorizations installed.
Used for spinning demos (Velvet Node.js exchange, .NET services).
Early work with CLI agents (Cline, Codeium, Codex CLI) and web UIs. ~8–15 sessions.

orchestrator.name: Vibe Diffuse Kanban

behavior.persistence: do not mirror all raw sessions into repo; index only high-signal artefacts

orchestrator.notes: Primary interface for coding agents; accessed even from mobile.

tmux.policy: Create dedicated tmux session per project; organize by tabs for tools and tasks

session_storage.raw: kept in orchestrator/runtime; not all checked-in
session_storage.indexing: link only essential artefacts into memory-bank with YYYYMMDD-HHMM prefix

manifests.role: SSOT for agents; indices drive navigation

git_policy.notes: Repositories may have multiple remotes configured; origin points to customer GitLab, additional mirrors used for owner workflows and third-party service integrations.
